appearance.DESCRIPTION: Single user of this blog system.
appearance.TITLE: Personal Owner

appearance.DESCRIPTION: The internal Microsoft Exchange e-mail system.
appearance.TITLE: E-mail System

appearance.DESCRIPTION: Allows owner blog to view, create and manage his created posts.
appearance.TITLE: Blog System

relationships.title: Personal Owner -> Blog System
relationships.description: User will use blog system to mange their posts.

relationships.title: Blog System -> E-mail System
relationships.description: Blog system use Email system to send notifications about new posts by email.

appearance.DESCRIPTION: Provides blog system functionality via a JSON/HTTPS API.
appearance.TITLE: Blog Server

appearance.DESCRIPTION: Stores user registration information, hashed authentication credentials, access logs, etc.
appearance.TITLE: Database

relationships.title: Blog Server System -> Database
relationships.description: Blog system uses Database as data source, stores all informations of system.

appearance.TITLE: Authentication
appearance.DESCRIPTION: Provides authentication functionality such as login, register.

appearance.TITLE: Post Module
appearance.DESCRIPTION: Provides information of posts, contains following information: title, description, content.

appearance.TITLE: News Module
appearance.DESCRIPTION: Provides information of news, contains following information: title, description, content.

appearance.TITLE: Contact
appearance.DESCRIPTION: Provides information of contacts, contains following information: title, email, content.

appearance.TITLE: User
appearance.DESCRIPTION: Provides information of users, contains following information: username, password, email, phone.
Display a form contains all field to create new Post. Submit form will post data to /post/create. If create successfully, please alert created success. If not, please display error message.
appearance.TITLE: Creation Screen

descriptions.description: Create new post in database by data from request.

appearance.DESCRIPTION: This view file will have 2 button: Edit, Delete. Edit button to get edit form at /post/edit/:id with id will be its ID. Delete button to get delete at /post/delete/:id with id will be its ID.
appearance.TITLE: Detail Screen

descriptions.description: Find post by id.

appearance.DESCRIPTION: Display form contains all the information of single Post record. Submit form will post data to /post/edit/:id. If updated successfully, please alert updated success. Otherwise, please display error message.
appearance.TITLE: Update Screen

descriptions.description: Update the the information post by data from request.

appearance.DESCRIPTION: Data will be displayed as a list, each of element will have three buttons to view, update and delete it. 'View' button will lead to get detail view of Post at /post/detail/:id with id will be its ID.'Update' button will lead to get edit form at /post/edit/:id with id will be its ID.'Delete' button will lead to get delete at /post/delete/:id with id will be its ID.Screen will have a search bar to search post by its name.
appearance.TITLE: List Screen

descriptions.description: Get all existing posts in database.

relationships.title: List All Screen -> Creation Screen
relationships.description: List of posts contains buttons to create or update new post.

relationships.title: List All Screen -> Update Screen
relationships.description: List of posts contains buttons to create or update post.

appearance.DESCRIPTION: Contain a login form with username and password. Submit form will post data to '/authentication/login' endpoint.
appearance.TITLE: Login Screen

descriptions.description: Find account by username and password
If find successfully, please generate accessToken for this username, and redirect to /
Otherwise, please alert login failed.

appearance.DESCRIPTION: Contain a register form with username, password, email, phone. Submit form will post data to '/authentication/register' endpoint.
appearance.TITLE: Register Screen

descriptions.description: Create new account with sent data in register request.
If create successfully, please redirect to /authentication/login.
Otherwise, please alert register failed.

relationships.title: Register Screen -> Login Screen
relationships.description: Register success will lead to Login page.

appearance.DESCRIPTION: Display a form contains all field to create new User. Submit form will post data to /user/create. If create successfully, please redirect to '/user/'. If not, please display error message.
appearance.TITLE: New User Screen

descriptions.description: Create new user in database by data from request.

appearance.DESCRIPTION: This screen will have 2 button: Edit, Delete. 'Edit' button is used get edit user form at /post/edit/:id with id will be its user id. 'Delete' button is used to get delete at /post/delete/:id with id will be its user id.
appearance.TITLE: View Screen

descriptions.description: Find user by id.

appearance.DESCRIPTION: Screens contains form displays all the information of single User record. Submit form will post data to /user/edit/:id. If updated successfully, please redirect to '/user/'. Otherwise, please display error message.
appearance.TITLE: Update Screen

descriptions.description: Find user by id.
Update information of user by data from request.

appearance.DESCRIPTION: Screen will displayed all users as a list, each of element will have three buttons to view, update and delete user. 'View' button will get detail view of User at /user/detail/:id with id will be its user id. 'Update' button will get edit form at /user/edit/:id with id will be its user id. 'Delete' button get delete at /user/delete/:id with id will be its user id. Screen will have a search bar to search user by username.
appearance.TITLE: List All Screen

descriptions.description: Find all existing users in database.

relationships.title: List All Screen -> New User Screen
relationships.description: List of users contains button to create new user.

relationships.title: List All Screen -> Update Screen
relationships.description: List of posts contains button to update existed user.

appearance.TITLE: Creation Screen
appearance.DESCRIPTION: Display a form contains all field to create new contact message. Submit form will post data to /contact/create. If create successfully, please alert created success. If not, please display error message.

descriptions.description: Create new contact record in database by data from request.

appearance.TITLE: View Screen
appearance.DESCRIPTION: This view file will have 'Delete' button. 'Delete' button to get delete at /contact/delete/:id with id will be its ID.

descriptions.description: Find contact by id.

appearance.TITLE: List All Screen
appearance.DESCRIPTION: Data will be displayed as a list, each of element will have two buttons to view, and delete it. 'View' button will lead to get detail view of Post at /contact/detail/:id with id will be its ID. 'Delete' button will lead to get delete at /post/contact/:id with id will be its ID. Screen will have a search bar to search contact by its title.

descriptions.description: Get all existing contacts in database.

relationships.title: List All Screen -> Creation Screen
relationships.description: List of contacts contains buttons to create new contact.

relationships.title: List All Screen -> View Screen
relationships.description: List of contacts contains buttons to view existing contact.

appearance.TITLE: Login Screen
appearance.DESCRIPTION: Contain a login form with username and password. Submit form will post data to '/authentication/login' endpoint.

descriptions.description: Find account by username and password
If find successfully, please generate accessToken for this username, and redirect to /
Otherwise, please alert login failed.

appearance.TITLE: Register Screen
appearance.DESCRIPTION: Contain a register form with username, password, email, phone. Submit form will post data to '/authentication/register' endpoint.

descriptions.description: Create new account with sent data in register request.
Otherwise, please alert register failed.

relationships.title: Register Screen -> Login Screen
relationships.description: Register successfully will be redirected to Login page.

appearance.TITLE: Comment
appearance.DESCRIPTION: Provides information of post comments, contains following information: title, content, author name.

appearance.DESCRIPTION: Provides information of posts, contains following information: title, description, content.

appearance.TITLE: Category
appearance.DESCRIPTION: Provides information of post category, contains following information: title, description, content.

appearance.TITLE: Tag
appearance.DESCRIPTION: Provides information of post tags, contains following information: title, description.

relationships.description: One post contains many comments.

relationships.description: One post has many tags.
